amendment.description: Amendment sought to exempt settlement agreements that pertain to providing restitution for a State.
amendment.purpose: An amendment numbered 3 printed in House Report 114-724 to exempt settlement agreements that pertain to providing restitution for a State.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Jackson Lee amendment (A003) Failed by voice vote.
